image.caption: Willamette's Lexi Bando drives past a pair of Milwaukie defenders as she goes to the basket during Willamette High School's 59-37 victory over Milwaukie at Matthew Knight Arena Thursday, March 7, 2013 in Eugene, Ore. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Willamette's Lexi Bando drives to the hoop during Willamette's 69-44 victory over Corvallis at Matthew Knight Arena Friday, March 8, 2013 in Eugene, Ore. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Willamette's Lexi Bando grabs for an offensive rebound in traffic during Willamette's 69-44 victory over Corvallis at Matthew Knight Arena Friday, March 8, 2013 in Eugene, Ore. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Lexi Bando of Willamette hauls down a rebound in the middle of the Springfield defense during Willamette's victory over Springfield in Eugene, Ore. on Tuesday, February 18, 2014. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Willamette's Lexi Bando drives to the hoop during Willamette's 50-18 victory over Wilson in the quarterfinals of Class 5A state tournament at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. on Wednesday, March 12, 2014. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Willamette's Lexi Bando puts up a shot over Lily Brodrick of Wilson during Willamette's 50-18 victory over Wilson in the quarterfinals of Class 5A state tournament at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. on Wednesday, March 12, 2014. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Willamette's Lexi Bando steals the ball from Veronica Rivers of Wilson during Willamette's 50-18 victory over Wilson in the quarterfinals of Class 5A state tournament at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. on Wednesday, March 12, 2014. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Lexi Bando puts up a shot in the paint during Willamette's 67-52 victory over the Warriors in the semifinals of the OSAA 5A State Championships at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. on Friday, March 14, 2014. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Lexi Bando is fouled by a pair of Lebanon defenders under the basket during Willamette's 67-52 victory over the Warriors in the semifinals of the OSAA 5A State Championships at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. on Friday, March 14, 2014. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Lexi Bando shoots over a pair of Lebanon defenders during Willamette's 67-52 victory over the Warriors in the semifinals of the OSAA 5A State Championships at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. on Friday, March 14, 2014. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Willamette's Lexi Bando drives against Leslie Robinson of Corvallis during Willamette's 63-54 state championship victory at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. on Saturday, March 15, 2014. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Willamette's Lexi Bando and Hannah Creswick of Corvallis battle for possession of a loose ball during Willamette's 63-54 state championship victory at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. on Saturday, March 15, 2014. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Willamette players embrace after winning the state championship over Corvallis 63-54 at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. on Saturday, March 15, 2014. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Lexi Bando hits a three-pointer in the second half of Oregon's 63-57 victory over USC in Eugene, Oregon on Monday, February 2, 2015. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Lexi Bando passes in front of defender K'lynn Willis during Oregon's 86-51 victory over Hampton Thursday, November 19, 2015 at Matthew Knight Arena. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Lexi Bando is fouled under the basket during Oregon's 86-51 victory over Hampton Thursday, November 19, 2015 at Matthew Knight Arena. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Lexi Bando hits a shot in the first half of Oregon's game against San Jose State. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Lexi Bando battles Emily Vann of San Jose State along the sideline in the first half of Oregon's game against the Spartans. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Lexi Bando drives in the lane against Ellie Stevens in the first half of Oregon's game against San Jose State. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Lexi Bando, who finished with 17 points, hits a short jumper during Oregon's 73-70 victory over Idaho. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Lexi Bando, who finished with 17 points, watches a three-point attempt during Oregon's 73-70 victory over Idaho. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Oregon's Lexi Bando shoots between Utah defenders Wendy Anae (21) and Paige Crozon (14) during Oregon's 84-66 victory over Utah. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Oregon's Lexi Bando and the Pit Crew celebrate her three-point shot against Drake in the second round of the Women’s Preseason NIT. (Chris Pietsch/The Register-Guard)

Oregon's Lexi Bando puts up a shot from beyond the arc over Oklahoma defender Ana Llanusa during Oregon's 92-74 victory over the Sooners at Matthew Knight Arena Saturday, November 25, 2017. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Oregon's Lexi Bando hits a three-pointer during Oregon's 87-45 victory over Hampton at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. Tuesday, November 28, 2017. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Oregon's Lexi Bando looks for help between a pair of Hampton defenders during Oregon's 87-45 victory over Hampton at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. Tuesday, November 28, 2017. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Oregon's Lexi Bando hits one of her five first-half three-pointers while Weber State head coach Bethann Ord watches during Oregon's 114-87 victory over Weber State at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. Saturday, December 2, 2017. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Oregon's Lexi Bando hits one of her five first-half three-pointers over Weber State's Emily Drake during Oregon's 114-87 victory over Weber State at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. Saturday, December 2, 2017. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Oregon's Lexi Bando drives against Weber State's Shine Johnson during Oregon's 114-87 victory over Weber State at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. Saturday, December 2, 2017. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)

Oregon's Lexi Bando hits a three-point basket over Southern Utah defender Kiana Johnson during the Ducks 98-38 victory over Southern Utah at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore. Saturday, December 9, 2017. (Brian Davies/The Register-Guard)
Oregon Lexi Bando leaps into the air in celebration after sinking a three point shot in double overtime against USC. (Chris Pietsch/The Register-Guard)

Oregon''s Maite Cazorla, left, Lexi Bando, Anneli Maley and Ruthy Hebard celebrate their double OT80-74 win over USC in an NCAA women basketball game in Eugene, Ore. Friday Feb. 16, 2018. (Chris Pietsch/The Register-Guard)
Oregon's Lexi Bando celebrates in the locker room with Satou Sabally, Aina Ayuso and the rest of the team after defeating USC in double OT. (Chris Pietsch/The Register-Guard)

Oregon forward Mallory McGwire and Oregon guard Lexi Bando celebrate after No. 8 Oregon's 101-94 win over No. 10 UCLA in overtime at Matthew Knight Arena in Eugene, Ore., Monday, February 19, 2018. It was Bando's last regular-season home game as an Oregon player. (Andy Nelson/The Register-Guard)
Oregon senior guard Lexi Bando is celebrated by teammates during Senior Night festivities at Matthew Knight Arena. (Andy Nelson/The Register-Guard)

Oregon senior guard Lexi Bando is hugged by head coach Kelly Graves during Senior Night festivities at Matthew Knight Arena. Bando was Graves' first four-year senior to graduate. (Andy Nelson/The Register-Guard)
Oregon senior guard Lexi Bando waves to the crowd during Senior Night festivities at Matthew Knight Arena. (Andy Nelson/The Register-Guard)
Fans acknowledge seniors Justine Hall and Lexi Bando during Senior Night festivities at Matthew Knight Arena. (Andy Nelson/The Register-Guard)
Oregon seniors Lexi Bando and Justine Hall embrace during Senior Night festivities at Matthew Knight Arena. (Andy Nelson/The Register-Guard)
